Description.Text: This 4-star hotel was inaugurated in March 2009 and is located in Bakirkoy, a large, densely populated middle class residential suburb of Istanbul and is just 5 Km away from Istanbul Ataturk airport. The hotel is just a few steps away from the IETT Carsi Duragi bus stop and approximately 1 Km away from the Bakirkoy train station. Thanks to an efficient public transport network, access to Istanbuls attractions is made quick and easy. The hotel was designed in order to respond to expectations of businessmen with its distinctive and elegant rooms, a roof bar with panoramic views, hairdresser, florist, drugstore, and a wellness and spa centre established on an area of 2500 m2. Alesta restaurant offers an open buffet breakfast and dinner in a meticulously decorated atmosphere area (breakfast: 07:00 10:30; dinner: 19:00 22:30). The Compass bar and restaurant offers magnificent views of the Sea of Marmara under the stars, live music performances and delicious meals. The tastefully decorated rooms are 28sqm and offer views of the city. The walls are decorated with works of art and come well-equipped with modern amenities, and fitted with a bathroom/WC with a specially designed bathtub and shower. There is also a sitting area, a spacious and practical wardrobe, and plush bedding with an orthopedic bed and pillows.
